abstract: Google shuts down its Lively virtual world, while a reporter concludes that life in Second Life is mostly boring.
snippet: Google shuts down its Lively virtual world, while a reporter concludes that life in Second Life is mostly boring.
lead_paragraph: Online virtual worlds were dealt a heavy helping of reality this week.

headline.main: Google Unplugs Lively as Hype Fades Over Virtual Worlds

abstract: Google C.E.O. Eric Schmidt and Bits readers chime in on whether Google violates its “Don’t be evil” motto.
snippet: Google C.E.O. Eric Schmidt and Bits readers chime in on whether Google violates its “Don’t be evil” motto.
lead_paragraph: UPDATE: Video clips of the debate on whether Google violates its “Don’t be evil” motto are here. The transcript and other information is here.

headline.main: More on the ‘Is Google Evil?’ Debate
